00020 #ifndef NETWORK_INETADDRESS_H
00021 #define NETWORK_INETADDRESS_H
00022 
00023 // Libreria ARPA ( Contiene funzioni utili come inet_addr(char* addr) )
00024 #include <arpa/inet.h>     
00025 
00026 #include <rdkcore/network/socketaddress.h>
00027 #include <rdkcore/network/netexception.h>
00028 
00029 namespace Network {
00030 
00031 class InetAddress : public SocketAddress {
00032     // Constructors
00033     public:
00035         InetAddress() throw();
00036         
00038         InetAddress( unsigned short port ) throw();
00039         
00041         InetAddress( const std::string& address, unsigned short port ) throw( NetException );
00042         
00044         inline InetAddress( const struct sockaddr_in& address ) throw() : SocketAddress((struct sockaddr&)address) {};
00045         
00046         InetAddress( const SocketAddress& address ) throw( NetException );
00047 
00048     // Getters interface
00049     public:
00051         inline const std::string& getCreationAddress() const throw() { return creationAddress; }
00052         
00054         inline std::string getIPAddress() const throw() { return inet_ntoa( ((struct sockaddr_in&)address).sin_addr ); }
00055         
00057         inline unsigned short getPort() const throw() { return ntohs( ((struct sockaddr_in&)address).sin_port); }
00058         
00060         inline short getFamily() const throw() { return ((struct sockaddr_in&)address).sin_family; }
00061         
00063         inline const struct sockaddr_in& getAddress() const throw() { return (struct sockaddr_in&)address; }
00064         
00066         inline struct sockaddr_in& getAddress() throw() { return (struct sockaddr_in&)address; }
00067         
00068     // Setters interface
00069     public:
00071         void setAddress( const std::string& address ) throw ( NetException );
00072         
00074         inline void setPort( unsigned short port ) throw() { ((struct sockaddr_in&)address).sin_port = htons(port); }
00075         
00077         inline void setAddress( const struct sockaddr_in& address ) throw() {
00078             this->address = (struct sockaddr&)address; creationAddress = ""; }
00079             
00080         bool operator<( const InetAddress& ) const;
00081         
00082     private:
00083         std::string creationAddress;
00084 };
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 #endif
